thread.title: BREAKING: Trump Decides Fate of FBI Director Comey, Asks Him to Stay On…
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump Decides Fate of FBI Director Comey, Asks Him to Stay On…

author: Nickarama
title: BREAKING: Trump Decides Fate of FBI Director Comey, Asks Him to Stay On…
text:
Do you like this article? 
This news is guaranteed to excite comment on both sides of the aisle. 
President Trump has reportedly asked FBI Director James Comey to stay on in the job. 
From Washington Examiner: 
The New York Times reported Comey told top agents he had been asked to stay on. The two seemed friendly during a meeting this weekend where Trump called Comey “more famous than me.” 
Comey has been a lightning rod for criticism on both sides of the aisle since the summer for his statements regarding the investigation into Hillary Clinton’s private email server. 
“Lightning rod” is the word for it. 
Those on the left are likely to have a coronary over this news, particularly those who felt that Comey’s investigations in the latter days of the campaign hurt Hillary Clinton’s chances. 
According to the Washington Examiner, the FBI is investigating several of Trump’s associates and their connections with the Russian government. 
This would leave Comey in charge of such investigations. 
The director of the FBI serves a 10-year term, which is supposed to give the director political independence from whatever administration is in the White House. Comey was appointed by President Obama in 2013. 
Clinton reportedly planned to fire Comey, had she won. LIKE this article?
